item.title: 0day - Socket.io-file <= 2.0.31 â€“ Improper Input Validation in File Upload Functionality
item.description: During one of my penetration tests for a local military equipment supplier while working for Auxilium Cyber Security, I faced a web application running on an embedded device that used web sockets in order to initiate the connection between the server and the client. There are several different technologies that can be used in the backend system in order to make use of web sockets, but the client made use of Socket.
